text:
League 1
ASSE: Zidane pinch it for Saliba?
Author of a good performance last night against Monaco (ASSE 1-0 win), William Saliba, central defender loaned by Arsenal this season, would interest Real Madrid.
04 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Mourad Bennis



Saint-Etienne won an important match last night against Monaco as part of the 12th day. William Salida achieved a high level performance in central defense. Saliba, born in Bondy, would already stir up the desires of Real Madrid at just 18 years old.




Saliba likes Real Madrid




William Saliba + 9 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

William Saliba has a bright future ahead of him. Transferred this summer to Arsenal for 30 million euros and then loaned to Saint-Etienne this season, the native of Bondy achieved a satisfactory start to the year 2019-2020. His performances would have had an interesting echo in Madrid.
Indeed, according to the information of the Express, the Real de Zidane, not insensitive to the intrinsic qualities of the player of Saint-Etienne, would follow attentively the evolution of the central defender. The Merengue would be looking for a new Rafael Varane, in other words a fast player, technical and able to raise well.
Â William Saliba: all information about the player
